name: CMIOExtensionStreamCustomClockConfiguration
desc: An object that describes the parameters to create a custom clock on the host side.

items.name: init(clockName: String, sourceIdentifier: UUID, getTimeCallMinimumInterval: CMTime, numberOfEventsForRateSmoothing: UInt32, numberOfAveragesForRateSmoothing: UInt32)
var sourceIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: A universally unique identifier for the clock.

items.name: var getTimeCallMinimumInterval: CMTime
items.desc: A minimum call time interval for the clock.

items.name: var numberOfEventsForRateSmoothing: UInt32
items.desc: The number of events to use for rate smoothing.

items.name: var numberOfAveragesForRateSmoothing: UInt32
items.desc: The number of averages to use for rate smoothing.
